definition: of or relating to or characteristic of members of the family Canidae, any of various fissiped mammals with nonretractile claws and typically long muzzles
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of members of the family Canidae
- of or relating to a pointed conical tooth
= synonyms: laniary
noun
- any of various fissiped mammals with nonretractile claws and typically long muzzles
= synonyms: canid
- one of the four pointed conical teeth located between the incisors and the premolars
= example: one of the four pointed conical teeth located between the incisors and the premolars
= synonyms: dogtooth, canine tooth, eyetooth, eye tooth, cuspid
